document.full_text: for baltimore ravens safety tom zbikowski, the nfl lockout is a lucky event, a matter of perfect timing that allows the former notre dame football captain a chance to pursue his passion for boxing.
document.title: ravens' tom zbikowski uses lockout to explore ring career
lines_and_colors: for baltimore ravens safety tom zbikowski, the nfl lockout is a lucky event, a matter of perfect timing that allows the former notre dame football captain a chance to pursue his passion for boxing.
